name: Path of Pigment act 1
description:
A short 30-minute RPG made in 8 days (and some change) for Shared Universe Jam

This is the first act of a much longer story. The full story may or may not be finished sometime in the far future

Controls:
Arrows XC
WASD JK
Dpad AX

Features:
Simple walking simulator gameplay
2 or 3 Bullet hell battles
Various bugs thrown in for good measure

A game by:
ZahranW (Audio, Programming, Design)
KingW (Art, Design)
